translations: n.[贸易]特许权，公民权（franchise 的复数形式）
v.赋予特权，赋予公民权（franchise 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: They operate franchises in London and Paris.
sentences.translation: 他们在伦敦和巴黎经营专卖店。

sentences.sentence: Disney now has ten "franchises" that it treats in this way, from Mickey Mouse to Disney Fairies.
sentences.translation: 目前迪斯尼现在有十项这样的“专营权”，从米老鼠到迪斯尼精灵。

sentences.sentence: Permanent franchises are rarely built on one character alone.
sentences.translation: 永久的经销权很少能够仅仅建立在某一个角色的基础上。
